sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { adminAPI, mlAPI } from '../services/api'; import '../dashboards/StudentDashboard.css'; function AdminDashboard({ user, onLogout }) { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [students, setStudents] = useState([]); const [teachers, setTeachers] = useState([]); const [classes, setClasses] = useState([]); const [weakStudents, setWeakStudents] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchData(); }, []); const fetchData = async () => { try { const [studentsRes, teachersRes, classesRes, weakRes] = await Promise.all([ adminAPI.getStudents(), adminAPI.getTeachers(), adminAPI.getClasses(), mlAPI.getWeakStudents(), ]); setStudents(studentsRes.data); setTeachers(teachersRes.data); setClasses(classesRes.data); setWeakStudents(weakRes.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) return
Loading...
; return (

Admin Dashboard

{user.email}
{activeTab === 'overview' && (

Total Students

{students.length}

Total Teachers

{teachers.length}

Total Classes

{classes.length}

At-Risk Students

{weakStudents.length}

Students Needing Attention (ML Predictions)

{weakStudents.map((student) => ( ))}
Student Current Average Risk Level Attendance
{student.student_name} {student.current_average?.toFixed(1)}% {(student.weak_probability * 100).toFixed(0)}% Risk {student.attendance_rate?.toFixed(1)}%
)} {activeTab === 'students' && (

Students Management

{students.map((student) => ( ))}
Name Email Class Roll Number Admission Date
{student.first_name} {student.last_name} {student.email} {student.class_name} {student.section} {student.roll_number} {student.admission_date ? new Date(student.admission_date).toLocaleDateString() : 'N/A'}
)} {activeTab === 'teachers' && (

Teachers Management

{teachers.map((teacher) => ( ))}
Name Email Department Qualification Phone
{teacher.first_name} {teacher.last_name} {teacher.email} {teacher.department || 'N/A'} {teacher.qualification || 'N/A'} {teacher.phone || 'N/A'}
)} {activeTab === 'classes' && (

Classes Management

{classes.map((cls) => ( ))}
Class Section Academic Year Class Teacher Students
{cls.class_name} {cls.section || 'N/A'} {cls.academic_year} {cls.teacher_name || 'Not Assigned'} {cls.student_count}
)}
); } export default AdminDashboard;
